      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83399</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La transformation du noyau d'un atome de carbone-14 après qu'elle se délabre</string>
            <string language="en">Transformation of the nucleus of a carbon-14 atom after it decays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transformation des Kernes eines Karbon-1âtoms 
nach ihr verfällt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A transformação do núcleo de um átomo do 
carbono-14 após ela deteriora</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La trasformazione del nucleo di un atomo del 
carbonio-14 dopo esso decade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετασχηματισμός του πυρήνα ενός carbon-14 ατόμου 
αφότου αποσυντίθεται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La transformación del núcleo de un átomo del 
carbono-14 después de ella se decae</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que quand un carbone-14  se délabre, elle émet des rayonnements bêta et son noyau instable transforme en noyau stable d'un atome nitrogen-14.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that  when a carbon-14 decays, it emits beta radiation and its unstable nucleus transforms into the stable nucleus of a nitrogen-14 atom.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnements bêta</string>
            <string language="en">beta radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">atome de carbone-14</string>
            <string language="en">carbon-14 atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">affaiblissement</string>
            <string language="en">decay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">neutrons</string>
            <string language="en">Neutrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nitrogen-14 atome</string>
            <string language="en">nitrogen-14 atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">protons</string>
            <string language="en">Protons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">noyau stable</string>
            <string language="en">stable nucleus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">noyau instable</string>
            <string language="en">unstable nucleus</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, wenn ein Karbon-14 
verfällt, sie Betastrahlung ausstrahlt und sein instabiler Kern in 
den beständigen Kern eines Atoms nitrogen-14 umwandelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que quando um carbono-14 
deteriora, se emite a radiação beta e seu núcleo instável 
transforma no núcleo estável de um átomo nitrogen-14.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che quando il 
carbonio-14 decade, emette la radiazione beta ed il relativo nucleo 
instabile trasforma nel nucleo stabile di un atomo nitrogen-14.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι όταν αποσυντίθεται 
carbon-14, εκπέμπει τη βήτα ακτινοβολία και τις ασταθείς 
μετατροπές πυρήνων της στο σταθερό πυρήνα ενός ατόμου άζωτο- 
14.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que cuando un 
carbono-14 se decae, emite la radiación beta y su núcleo inestable 
transforma en el núcleo estable de un átomo nitrogen-14.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betastrahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karbon-1âtom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zerfall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neutronen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atom nitrogen-14</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
